Smart Gloves: Create a line of rubber gloves with built-in sensors and technology that can detect and monitor hand health, such as pressure, temperature, and sensitivity. These gloves can be worn by workers in various industries, including manufacturing, healthcare, and food service, to improve hand health and prevent injuries. Confidence Score: 0.8

Grip-Tech Gloves: Develop a line of rubber gloves with specialized grip technology that can enhance the wearer's grip strength and dexterity. These gloves can be marketed to athletes, musicians, and individuals with arthritis or other hand conditions. Confidence Score: 0.9

Heat-Resistant Gloves: Create a line of rubber gloves that are designed to withstand high temperatures, making them ideal for use in industrial settings where workers are exposed to hot surfaces or materials. These gloves can also be marketed to chefs, bakers, and other professionals who work with hot foods and ingredients. Confidence Score: 0.8

Anti-Microbial Gloves: Develop a line of rubber gloves with built-in anti-microbial properties that can help prevent the growth of bacteria and germs on the hands. These gloves can be marketed to healthcare professionals, food service workers, and individuals who work in environments where hygiene is critical. Confidence Score: 0.9

Scented Gloves: Create a line of rubber gloves that are infused with fragrances or essential oils, providing a pleasant scent for the wearer. These gloves can be marketed to individuals who work in settings where a pleasant scent can enhance their mood and productivity, such as gardeners, chefs, and artists. Confidence Score: 0.7
